= XML Format For Composite Objects =



This document contains the outline for a level XML file. Basically, each level has a {{{<level>}}} tag that specify the game objects and the rules specific to that level. All the game objects inside a level are outlined inside the tag <LevelObjects> and all the rules inside the level are stored inside the <LevelRules>. Please add to this format and all the attributes that would make a good level XML.
